mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.title, q.content, q.date, q.tag, q.sub, u.user_name FROM question as q JOIN users as u ON q.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT q.title, q.content, q.date, q.tag, q.sub, u.user_name, img.fileName FROM question as q LEFT JOIN users as u ON q.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN img_question as img ON q.id = img.question_id where q.id=#{id}

select ud.user_doctor_id as user_name,ud.user_doctor_medical as tag,h.hospital_name as sub from user_doctor as ud left join hospital as h on ud.user_doctor_hospital_code =h.hospital_code where ud.user_doctor_id =#{doctor_id};
select a.content,a.`date`,u.user_name,a.hospital_name as sub,a.user_doctor_medical as tag from answer a left join users u on a.user_doctor_id =u.user_id where a.question_id =#{question_id};
